title: AI system that spots guns in real-time video could help airport security
text:
AI system that spots guns in real-time video could help airport security Friday, March 23, 2018 - 01:42 
University of Granada (UGR) researchers have designed a computer algorithm that automatically recognises guns on video in real-time, as Jim Drury reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
University of Granada (UGR) researchers have designed a computer algorithm that automatically recognises guns on video in real-time, as Jim Drury reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2pBaUiD
